messages.subject: Way Cool Sites
messages.msgSnippet: These are some sites someone from another list I m on mentioned, and I thought you folks would enjoy them: Sci-Cops--enforcing the laws of
messages.messageBody:
These are some sites someone from another list I'm on mentioned, and I
thought you folks would enjoy them:

Sci-Cops--enforcing the laws of
science!http://www.jefflindsay.com/SciCop.shtml

Twinkies Project--once upon a time, some college
students wading through finals decided to conduct
tests on Twinkies...
http://www.twinkiesproject.com/

Smell of Gravity--what *does* it smell like? Opinions of Net passers-by.  Way
cool.
http://www.duke.edu/~bis/gravity/

Wildlife Biology Jokes--*much* funnier than it sounds.  Note:  some adult
humor.
http://members.aol.com/Bioweb98/page5.html

What I Have Read Since 1974
Not humor, but interesting.  This guy has
evidently tracked all his reading.
http://www.whatihaveread.net/

Apathyology
Not humor, but cool.  Read the FAQ.
http://www.apathyology.com/index.htm




[Non-text portions of this message have been removed]
